description:
Ever wanted to make your own Dungeons & Dragons monster miniature? I show you how with this step by step process that you can follow to get fantastic results. This weeping treant monster comes from the Shadows of the Dusk Queen game adventure.

Make your Dungeons and Dragons table come alive by learning these easy but amazing crafting techniques.

YOU WILL LEARN THESE CRAFTING TECHNIQUES IN THIS VIDEO:

-How to cheaply make a sculpture armature.

-Cold porcelain model sculpting.

-Using ready made materials in your sculpture to save time and effort.

-How to use modeling paste in sculpting for gap filling and details.

-A all-purpose craft glue you can use on anything.

-Make flocking that wonâ€™t fall off your terrain.

-painting large miniatures with cheap craft paints.

-Making your own gargantuan miniature base.

-Using homemade paint wash to shade your sculpture.

Visit the KOBOLD PRESS WEBSITE: https://koboldpress.com/

Pick Up the Adventure module here: https://amzn.to/2nlR8af

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase)
